I love what Grammarly can do ‚Äì but boy, its Premium tier is costly. Ironically, every time it corrects me, I want to pay for the service. But then I see how much it costs & I can‚Äôt convince myself that I need it enough. I tried LanguageTool for a year, but reconsidering now.

subs.text: I have been traveling for the past week ‚Äì rejuvenating myself amidst the nature. Relaxing on the beach. Had some wonderful rides, surrounded by dense jungles. Most of all, untouched by all the hustle bustle of the modern life. Wonder. Amazement. Serenity. [link]
